reviews.review: Mec y mec bala y bala

Hard to start with this one. It's totally worth of playing if you want to have fun and play any other mode than competetive match. So yea, if that's the case, go ahead and play it! 

For the competetive matches - Just don't. There are bunch of guys with microphone that sounds like you're 20km down under water, everyone will accuse you of cheating or losing the round, they will try to kick you, yell on you..  It's miracle meeting a normal team that you can actually play with. 

The thing that annoys me the most are smurfs. Imagine going into game with your friend, meeting five premades that spams in chat "we are veterans" and totally overrun you.  Another case is guys with only CS:GO bought on their profile with like 50-200 Hours played (mostly afked), shooting only heads, totally knowing everything and playing like gods. Smurfs. And yes, they will still fight and cry that they are not smurfs :D It's so hilarious. Stupidity of people playing and tryharding competetive matches is insane, ruining the whole game experience. Can't say it makes me angry, im just bored playing games like that. Angry and Bored are two different things.. :)
